message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, $10,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $13,000. Let me know if that's more to your liking.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. Would you be willing to go a bit lower to $11,000?

I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. I'm going to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal, so I'm sticking with $11,000. Let me know if that's acceptable to you.
I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $9,500?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. However, I'm still willing to work with you. I'm willing to come down to $10,500, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,000?
